dict.acceptation: 可怕的；危害极大的；<非正>很糟的；劣质的；

sent.orig: It is not "terrible" at all.It is anything but "terrible"
sent.trans: 完全没有什么“糟”，完全不是什么“糟得很”

sent.orig: They were frightened, not at the boy's terrible words, but at his terrible audacity.
sent.trans: 他们为这孩子的狂悖吃了惊，而对于他可怕的语言却一无所动。

sent.orig: And magic in both series can be used for terrible, terrible evil.
sent.trans: 而同时，两者中魔法都可以被用于破坏性的骇人邪恶。

sent.orig: It was pretty terrible! -It was bad! -awful! -Oh, it was terrible!
sent.trans: 那相当差！-不好！-糟糕透顶！-哦，是很糟糕！

sent.orig: Lynette: See? That's where I think we have been making a terrible, terrible mistake.
sent.trans: 看到了吧？那就是我觉得我们在哪犯了个严重的，严重的错误。
